sakura:BottledLove.NAME: Bottled Love
DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, choose a card. Upon taking damage, that card's damage is increased by 1 for the combat..
will increase in damage by 1 upon taking damage.
sakura:BottledLove.FLAVOR: The world outside is filled with impurities. People I hate. People in my way. Liars. Dirty people. I need to exterminate all risks.

sakura:PurpleSoulGem.NAME: Purple Soul Gem
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Restart the battle and all enemies deal 20% more damage.
sakura:PurpleSoulGem.FLAVOR: If…If it’s for your sake…I don’t mind being locked in this eternal maze.

sakura:BlueSoulGem.NAME: Blue Soul Gem
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Take no damage this combat and reduce your Max Health to #r10%. Cannot be used in boss combats. Can only be used twice.
sakura:BlueSoulGem.FLAVOR: I didn’t want this power so I could fight witches. I wanted it so I’d have the strength to do what’s right and protect the ones I love.

sakura:RedSoulGem.NAME: Red Soul Gem
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Gain #y10 Strength. You may no longer use Skills this combat. Can only be used on turn one
sakura:RedSoulGem.FLAVOR: If you live for yourself you’ve only got yourself to blame. So I can’t really blame anyone else and I don’t have any regrets.

sakura:YellowSoulGem.NAME: Yellow Soul Gem
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Deal 15 damage to ALL enemies. Apply 99 Vulnerable to yourself. Can only be used once per combat and only up to 8 times.
sakura:YellowSoulGem.FLAVOR: If you’re not 100% sure why you’re doing it, you’ll most certainly regret it later.

sakura:PinkSoulGem.NAME: Pink Soul Gem
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Deal damage equal to the charges on this relic. Gain charges equal to twice the damage you take.
sakura:PinkSoulGem.FLAVOR: If anyone ever tells me it’s a mistake to have hope, well then, I’ll just tell them they’re wrong. And I’ll keep telling them till they believe. No matter how many times it takes.

sakura:Convergence.NAME: Convergence
DESCRIPTION: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Reset your health, deck and relics to what they were at the start of the act. Generate a new version of the current act and start from the beginning. Lose #y20 Max Health.
sakura:Convergence.FLAVOR: I will never lose, not to you, nor to fate! For that is my choice!
